Posts.Content: notsure wrote: I had a biopsy in early August and have a meeting tomorrow with someone for 2nd opinion.  They call today and tell me they need another magnified mammogram and want me in in the am.  That is not possible based on daycare commute etc.  Why do they need more mammos?  I did the biopsy and had additional films taken. Do doctors require they do there own testing or is this really necessary?  How do I find out?   I just think they are trying to make more money.  There is no way possible I do not need surgery.  This pricess is so so frustrating.  Log in to post a reply

Posts.Title: Drains notsure Gabrielledr

Posts.Content: notsure wrote: Finally heard from surgeon after 2nd review of films.  1st radiologist recommended a biopsy.  Surgeon concerned about 2 areas of calcifications.  Now they say I have four and two need a biopsy.  Surgeon did say would be very difficult to do lump surgery and it would most likely be a masectomy.  I am freaking out now.  I call tomorrow to schedule the biopsy and additional mamo pictures of the other two areas.  May sound crazy I like my boobs and do not want to get rid of them.  I sometimes have a strange pain in the once with issues and now I keep thinking the cancer is growing.  I can barely breathe.  Any questions to ask before scheduling the biopsy other than sooner than later, this wait is making me nuts.  I just do not understand why this is all happening Thanks for reading Log in to post a reply
